name: Aegis Epecure
additionalNotes: Magno Cigars are new in Canada and are made in Nicaragua and blended by Carlos Pereda Robaina.  Carlos is the grandson of renown Cuban grower and blender Alejandro Robaina. This cigar has a leathery Habano  wrapper with a unique earthy tobacco aroma. A smooth draw gives way to slight white pepper notes  and leads into  a creamy nutty flavour. The Agis is an unlabeled  short fill with all the flavour of the Long Fill  Magno Inception Series
